lines.text:
[looking out at the California weather]
It is WAY to fuckin' cool to go to school today. Ah, but it's never too fuckin' cold to jack off.

[catching Kevin's stare]
You want it?
Sure.

[hearing the paperboy gagging]
Shut up and suck.

[under Mr. Egan's sexual onslaught]
Come... Slow down. Oh, God.

[slapped while ridden]
Don't leave my ass too red or my girlfriend will wonder what I've been doing.
Fuck your girlfriend!
Bet you love THIS big gun up your ass, don't cha.
[Mike bets John $100 he can nail the 18-year-old boy seen at a swimming pool]
I'm gonna win THAT hundred bucks. You wait and see.
No, you're not.
Yes, I am.
You ain't even gonna touch him.
Wh-what...
How you gonna prove it to me?
Just wait and see. I'll go over there and do it, come back and tell ya.
And I'm supposed to believe you?
Yes.
I've got a better idea.
What?

[pulls out a traveling case]
This little outfit CID boys back at base let me use. See that little window right there?
Yuh-huh.

[pulls out a video camera]
Da-da-da-da-da... And this!
Whoa!
Fits right inside. See this transmitter? Goes over a thousand feet, and I can see it all.
How much should you get paid for this massage?
Uh, fifty bucks.
Fifty bucks?
Mm-hm.
Wow. How many do you do a day?
Uh, about three, I'd say.
A hundred and fifty dollars?
Mm-hm.
Wow. That deal's pretty good money.
Yeah.
Do you do ladies, too?
Mm-hm. All the time.
Do you ever get to mess around with them?
Sometimes. You know... one thing leads to another.
Wow. You get fifty bucks and you get pussy, too?
I think it's time to do your legs. Uh... I don't wanna get oil on your shorts. Why don't you take your, uh, shorts off.
Oh, okay.
I think I'll take my shirt off. It's hot.
Why don't you take your underwear off? I don't wanna get any oil on 'em.
Well... I don't think I should do that.
Well, why not?
Well, I... kinda got a... problem down there.
Oh, don't worry about that. I'm a professional. I won't even notice it.

[watching Mike's seduction of the motel boy on his monitor]
Oh, shit! He's goin' for the pants.
You didn't tell me you were gonna do THIS.
Well, one thing leads to another.
I've never had a guy touching me like that before.
You like that?
Yeah, it's great.
Roll over. I'll show you something that feels even better.
I never thought I'd like it but I love it.
You like gettin' fucked, don't ya?
Hey, watch it. You're gonna rip my fundies. What's my girlfriend gonna say?
Fuck your girlfriend - I did.
You're always grab-grab grab, you know?
I really wanted to make it with that girl.
Yeah, get a little romance goin'.
How am I supposed to do that?
Well, you know, a woman's erogenous zones.
Erogenous zones?
Yeah, they're the same on a man as they are on a woman. You close your eyes, relax, I'll show you.
[Jeff lightly strokes the back of John's neck]
Mm.
You like that?
It's kind of different.
[Jeff wants some reciprocal treatment]
Oh, I can't do that.
Yes, you can.
Can't.
Come on.
Mm-mm.
Come on. Suck my dick.
No.
Come on.

All right, men, this is a survival game. The object of the game is to survive, and to do that, you kill your opponent with these - paint guns. Three shots to the kill zone and you're out. Any questions?
Yeah. Sounds good. Good for all of us.
Yeah? Well, I think we ought to make it more interesting. I say the loser gets stripped and tied to a tree all night long, and the other two head back to the base and drink beer.
All right.
It sounds good.
Let's go.
Good idea.
You guys are ROUGH!
